subject: Attention Honorable Beneficiary,
body:
Woodforest National Bank
Walmart Supercenter
The Woodlands, TX,
Adresa: 10001 Woodlands Pkwy, The Woodlands, TX 77382,


 Attention Honorable Beneficiary,


My Name Is Mrs.Cathleen H. Nash The bank's President And Chief
Executive Officer.Woodforest National Bank Effective,

This Is To Bring To Your Notice That We Have Received A Coded Telex
Message Of Your $1.5 Billion Dollars Usd Payment File From The United
Nation on February 9, 2024,

In Conjunction With The Telex Transfer Instructions From The United
Nation Credit Control And Treasury Bills Department. The
Woodforest National Bank Has Already OPEN ONLINE ACCOUNT on your name
by United Nation Instruction and transfer your fund to your online
account For Final Onward Crediting,

This Is 100% Risk Free And Money Laundry Free Also, This Is
Legitimate, The Grant Fund Approval Will Proof That, The Fund Is Not A
Money Laundry And Also It Will Proof That, The Fund Is Not A Drug
Money.

The SUPREME COURT OF UNITED STATES HAS ALREADY SIGN IT TO RELEASE YOUR
FUND TO YOU IMMEDIATELY, NOTED,THAT THE FUND RELEASE ORDER CERTIFICATE
MUST TO BE SECURED BY BENEFICIARY FROM THE OFFICE OF THE SUPREME COURT
HERE IN UNITED STATES OF AMERICA,

AND IT WILL COST YOU ONLY US$200 AND THAT IS THE FINAL PAYMENT THAT
YOU HAVE TO PAY AFTER THAT WE CAN FORWARDED YOUR ONLINE ACCOUNT
DETAILS TO YOU START ENJOY YOUR BENEFIT AND THE FEE CAN'T BE DEDUCTED
FROM THE FUND THAT IS AGAINST THE LAW,

This is the agreement concluded with the International Monetary Fund
(IMF) and (IRS) and you advised to try as much as you can to make this
payment for your fund release order certificate ,

But bear it in mind that if you refused to pay this fee in next two
days time your fund will be cancel by (IRS) and divert it to
Government Treasuries Account that is finally.

Be advised to Buy Steam Wallet Gift Card or iTunes card or Razor Gold
Card sum of US$200 gently scratch it and send the photo to us
immediately.

Even if you don’t have the US$200 try to borrow it and send it
immediately today because this is your life opportunity and I don’t
want you to lose the chance any more.

Note: If you will prefer to receive your funds in form of a ATM CARD,
Then we could load your funds into ATM CARD and post your Card to your
address by post,

Attached here is the scanned copy of my valid working identification
for your confidence,

Thank God bless you more together with your family,

Treat with urgency,

Yours sincerely,
Mrs.Cathleen H. Nash
Chief Executive Officer.
Woodforest National Bank

subject: IF IT IS TRUE LET ME KNOW
body:
IF IT IS TRUE LET ME KNOW, ATM DEPARTMENT OFFICE

Urgent Attention Beneficiary,

My dear listen, I receive phone call from MS. SOPHIA LOGAN,last week
the lady is from AMERICA here NY city,she told me that to collect the
clearance fee of $150 from her and Delivery this ATM  CARD or CHECK
sum of $55.5Million USD to her,Because she told me you are in the
hospital due to you have heart attack problem last week Tuesday .

But now i want to confirm from you first weather it is true or
not,because MS. SOPHIA LOGAN came to my Office this morning and
telling me that you are in the hospital and you are already give her
permission and Authority to pay this clearance fee of $150 and clam
this your ATM CARD as you are in the hospital.

so please let me confirm weather it is true or not from you before i
release your fund to MS. SOPHIA LOGAN as your next of kin,she come
from AMERICA here NY CITY. This is your life opportunity and i don't
want you to lose your fund and according to the AMERICA authority said
that if you failed to comply today and tomorrow by sending the fee
then your ATM CARD will be release to MS. SOPHIA LOGAN,

But if you sure that you don't give anybody Authority to pay this
clearance fee of $150 to clam this your fund then,you can try your
possible best to get back to us Today with this clearance fee.because
according to Federal Ministry of Finace after 2 days from today this
lady will pay this fee to clam this your ATM CARD that is Finally.

Bear it in mind that if you refused to pay this fee your fUnd will be
release to MS. SOPHIA LOGAN as your next of kin by Authority from
COURT,

You are hereby advised to purchase $150 by Sephora card or I Tunes
card which is $150 scratch it and attached the picture for your own
good,

Please provide the information below to COMPLETE YOUR delivery REGISTRATION:

1.  Full Name:
2.  Address:
3.  Occupation:
4.  Age:
5.  Sex:
6.  Nationality:
7.  State:
8.  Country Of Residence:
9.  Mobile Number:
10. Phone Number:
11.Your ID or passport;

God bless you if your alive with your family and try your best to see
that you will communications with us to make the patment immediately
today.
Regards,
Mr,Everett Robert,Executive Director
ATM DEPARTMENT OFFICE,

subject: Re: IF IT IS TRUE LET ME KNOW
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I must say, this is quite a surprising message. I don't recall giving anyone named Ms. Sophia Logan any authority to claim anything on my behalf. 

I'm not currently in the hospital and I haven't had a heart attack either, thank goodness! So, it seems like there might be some confusion here.

Could you please provide more details about this ATM card or check that you mentioned? How did it come into my name? And what is this clearance fee all about?

Also, could you clarify why Ms. Sophia Logan would be considered my next of kin? As far as I know, we're not related.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
James

subject: Re: Attention Honorable Beneficiary,
body:
Hello H. Nash,

Thank you for reaching out to me and providing such detailed information about this opportunity. It's not every day that one receives a message about a billion-dollar payment file! I must say, it sounds quite intriguing.

I'm curious though, how did the United Nations come to select me for this? And could you please explain more about the process of opening an online account in my name? 

Also, I'm not very familiar with Steam Wallet Gift Card or Razor Gold Card. Could you provide more details on how these work and why they are necessary for this transaction?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
James
